stories.fantasy_headline: Bard Spiegel Unveils New Melodies from an Ancient Artifact!
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Bard Spiegel, known for her enchanted tunes, has brought forth an ancient music-making artifact. Decades ago, she crafted the 'Melody Mouse,' a magical device letting anyone weave harmonious spells. Users move a mystic orb across a runic grid to conjure intricate, automatic melodies from the ether.

stories.fantasy_headline: Travelers Trade Bulky Tomes for Compact Enchanted Scrolls!
stories.fantasy_story: Why carry a heavy wizard's tome when a compact enchanted scroll can suffice? Adventurers are discovering small, foldable artifacts that expand into full writing surfaces. Paired with a slender scrying mirror, these tools offer all the functions of a grand spellbook in a tiny pouch. Just remember your enchanted quill before heading to the Alchemist's Brew!
